note.p: Education: Trinity College, Dublin. BA (1827); MA (1831, Oxford)
Career: Called to the English Bar (1831); Professor of Jurisprudence, University College, London (1839); Assistant Poor Law Commissioner (1846)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1870-1871 vol 19 pp xxvii-xxviii
References: W H Brock, 'The Selection of the Authors of the Bridgewater Treatises' in NR 1966 vol 21 pp 162-179
Notes: Proposers: 'Adare' is Edwin Richard Windham Wyndham-Quin , 3rd Earl of Dunraven and Mount-Earl, then Viscount Adare
